mapper.select: select * from customer_service order by postNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into customer_service (categoryCode, writer, postdate, title, contents) values(#{categoryCode}, #{writer}, now(), #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.delete: delete from customer_service where postNo in #{postNo};
mapper.select: select attachfileNo, originFile, thumbnailFile, notImageFile from attachfile where csBoardNo = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: insert into attachfile(csBoardNo, originFile, thumbnailFile, notImageFile) values(#{csBoardNo}, #{originFile},#{thumbnailFile}, #{notImageFile})
mapper.select: select max(postno) as nextno from customer_service;
